title: Dinosaur National Monument: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & More      Â       Petroglyphs at McKee Springs. NPS  Visitors to Dinosaur National Monument can discover fragments of a long ago world where the largest land creatures of all time once roamed and died. But Dinosaur National Monument is more than dinosaur fossils. Explore the Photo Galleries to see other unique features at Dinosaur: petroglyphs and pictographs, captivating scenery, homestead sites, whitewater rafting, and more. You can also stay connected with Dinosaur National Monument from anywhere in the world by tuning into our webcam for a view of Split Mountain.
